## Color24.toLEBytes() method

Returns a [little-endian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Endianness) `Buffer` representing the color.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toLEBytes(): Buffer;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Buffer

A `Buffer` representing the color.
